verses.roman:
śrī-kṛṣṇa-caitanya prabhu svayaṁ-bhagavān
tāṅhāra padāravinde ananta praṇāma

synonyms: śrī-kṛṣṇa-caitanya—Lord Śrī Kṛṣṇa Caitanya Mahāprabhu; prabhu—the Supreme Lord; svayam-bhagavān—is the original Personality of Godhead; tāṅhāra—His; pada-aravinde—unto the lotus feet; ananta—innumerable; praṇāma—respectful obeisances.
translation: Lord Śrī Kṛṣṇa Caitanya Mahāprabhu is the Personality of Godhead Himself, and therefore I offer innumerable prostrations at His lotus feet.
